TAGS.description: This is not a request to continue the conversation with a user, but instead is a request to generate a series of tags categorizing the conversation, and requires the LLM to respond in json format with the three tags.

TITLE.description: This is not a request to continue the conversation with a user, but instead is a request to generate a title for the conversation, and requires the LLM to respond only with the title text.

OTHER.description: An appropriate response does not fit into any of the other categories. This LLM is skilled in a wide range of topics, including technical discussion, software design, UX, general conversation and banter.
